before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"75u1t","text":"Mouse brain slices must first be fixed in 4% PFA and stained with desired dyes or antibodies, and typically stored in a well plate prior to mounting. Refer to protocols for sectioning and staining tissue to prepare tissue prior to mounting: Sectioning Mouse Brain with Sliding Microtome and Immunohistochemistry (IHC) Staining Mouse Brain Sections. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":241,"length":45},{"key":1,"offset":291,"length":56}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B4544C53906E4ACA838DFF36DD42C946","url":"https://www.protocols.io/edit/sectioning-mouse-brain-with-sliding-microtome-cxx8xprw"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"FE5C99D7141A4FDCAD09E6CC60938759","url":"https://www.protocols.io/edit/immunohistochemistry-ihc-staining-mouse-brain-sect-cxscxnaw/materials"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"aufo","text":"This protocol details mounting thin sliced mouse brain tissue sections onto charged slides in a uniform orientation that does not create wrinkles or artifacts that might interfere with imaging, and then how to apply a coverslip. After mounting and coverslipping, slides will be ready for imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jb1s","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

parent_protocols.title: Protocol Collection: Perfusing, Sectioning, IHC, Mounting and Coverslipping Mouse Brain Specimens

related_materials.name: Vectashield hardset anti-fade mounting medium with dapi

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6f044","text":"Using a small paintbrush, lift the first tissue section to be mounted out of the storage well plate and place section into the petri dish so that it lays flat close to the surface of the 1xPBS \u0026 Triton X-100 0.2% solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5g4iq","text":"Repeat steps 2 -4 until all sections have been mounted onto the slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1isus","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh5sk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dq6vh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8sg6c","text":"Mount sections onto each slide in one to three rows, so that they all have the same left/right orientation. Often the cerebral cortex will be shallowly notched during slicing on the left or right side to indicate left/right orientation, it will be helpful to refer to this.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7c7bi","text":"Using paintbrush, lift the tissue section out of the petri dish and place it onto the slide. Arrange tissue section with paintbrush to ensure section is properly aligned, flat, and wrinkle-free with small paintbrush. This can usually be done by eye, but a dissection scope may be used if desired at times when it is difficult to see fine anatomical detail in the slices macroscopically (just by eye).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2csd","text":"Protect slides from light and allow slides to dry at   for a minimum of   or until adhered to the slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9vmk1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pucr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3q32","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4560A1B8316A11EE8A0B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"4560A121316A11EE8A0B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"75apf","text":"Slides can be protected from light by placing a sheet of aluminum foil or a box lid over the slides, or any other equivalent method of covering slides to shield from light.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89b58","text":"Once sections are dry, rinse off 1xPBS residue by briefly rinsing the slide with Milli-Q water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9q0r1","text":"Blot off any residual Milli-Q water by pressing the edge of the slide onto a kimwipe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddjh3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59b71","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"96cme","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bf8r0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9clqv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2tl9r","text":"Proceed to step 9 immediately -- slides should be coverslipped same day as mounting.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4m7k","text":"Prepare a petri dish filled with 1xPBS \u0026 Triton X-100 0.2%. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1c271","text":"Choose requested mounting medium:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpdvm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e97pq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1c8fa","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87b9i","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"chs3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a0q5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9np3b","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["Frequently requested mounting media","Notes"],"colWidths":["277","302"],"data":[["Vectashield hardset anti-fade mounting medium, Vector Laboratories (H-1400-10)",""],["Vectashield hardset anti-fade mounting medium with dapi, Vector Laboratories (H-1500-10)","Generally not requested if dapi was already used as a secondary stain. Staining with dapi as a secondary stain provides stronger staining than vecta shield with dapi."],["ProLong Glass Antifade Mountant (P36980)","Good for minimizing optical refraction and preserving fluorescent signal"]],"guid":"B4D62DF02FDC11EEBB477FAFEDFD99EF","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Vectashield hardset anti-fade mounting medium, Vector Laboratories (H-1400-10)",""],["Vectashield hardset anti-fade mounting medium with dapi, Vector Laboratories (H-1500-10)","Generally not requested if dapi was already used as a secondary stain. Staining with dapi as a secondary stain provides stronger staining than vecta shield with dapi."],["ProLong Glass Antifade Mountant (P36980)","Good for minimizing optical refraction and preserving fluorescent signal"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5npua","text":"Place a few drops of chosen mounting medium onto the slide to be coverslipped, making sure there are no bubbles. If mounting medium bottle does not have dropper attachment, use a pipette to place drops on slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a2cnu","text":"Start with only one edge of the coverslip touching the corresponding edge of the slide, and slowly lay down the coverslip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lq72","text":"If re-coverslipping is required due to air bubbles overlapping onto tissue sections or other artifacts, soak slide in 1xPBS in a petri dish until coverslip comes off easily and repeat step 10. Do not use force to pull off a stuck coverslip; soak the slide longer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"xkhgi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"561ABA4A57D911EEB01E0A58A9FEAC02","height":312,"id":455276,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"a5ls1\",\"text\":\"Correctly coverslipped slide with no air bubbles overlapping tissue sections.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/p6vqb5787.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/p6vnb5787.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/p6vpb5787.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/p6vmb5787.webp","width":521}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkf8r","text":"Allow slides to dry   at  , protecting from light by covering slides with a sheet of aluminum foil, a box top, or other material that will shield slides from light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"56168B602FDD11EEBB477FAFEDFD99EF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6224FC1857D911EEB01E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9rds0","text":"Store slides at    protected from light until ready for imaging. Slides can be stored for several months.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"729E78102FDD11EEBB477FAFEDFD99EF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"85oco","text":"Wear gloves and appropriate PPE as mouse brain tissue may contain trace amounts of Azide and Paraformaldehyde.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
